channel.title: Experiences on Sansit Patnaik
channel.description: Recent content in Experiences on Sansit Patnaik

item.title: Supply Chain Internship
item.description: Hindustan Unilever Limited May 2017 - July 2017 I completed my summer internship at Pondy Tea Factory, Puducherry under the mentorship of Mr. B N Gohokar. My project primarily aimed at minimizing Tea dust by 30% of the current level escaping through various Tea handling and packing activities from Blending to Packing. Apart from that, I was involved in various other activities like beyond work safety assessment, software training for employees, career counseling workshop for children, voluntary work at Prabhat, etc.

item.title: Teaching Assistant
item.description: Indian Institute of Technology Kanpur August 2018 - Present I am currently teaching assistant for the Course “Introduction to IC engines,” taught by Prof. Avinash K. Agarwal. My work involves preparing course material, assignment, and quizzes.
